catalog_script_client.name: Check Cost

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_5c8c508697d321105515fef3a253af81
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Car Parking Reservation">e2e13f79971321105515fef3a253af04</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:975dd0c697d321105515fef3a253af52</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Check Cost</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
    if(newValue != '') {
		var costTotal = 0;
		if (newValue[2] == 'D' && newValue[3] == 'a' && newValue[4] == 'y')
         {
           g_form.setValue('cost',200);
         }
		else {
             if (newValue[1] != " "){
              g_form.setValue('cost',200); }
             else{
                  if (parseInt(newValue[0])>8 ){g_form.setValue('cost',200);} 
                  else {
					if  (parseInt(newValue[0])<=1) {costTotal += 10;}
                    if  ((parseInt(newValue[0])>1) && (parseInt(newValue[0])<=4)) {costTotal += (15*(parseInt(newValue[0])-1))+10;}
					if  ((parseInt(newValue[0])>4) && (parseInt(newValue[0])<=8)) {costTotal += (20*(parseInt(newValue[0])-4))+55;}
					g_form.setValue('cost',costTotal);
            }

			}
		}
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-09 08:47:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5c8c508697d321105515fef3a253af81</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Cost</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CarParkingReservation" source="x_1067756_carparki">d6eaa7b1971321105515fef3a253afb5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CarParkingReservation">d6eaa7b1971321105515fef3a253afb5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5c8c508697d321105515fef3a253af81</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-09 10:44:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
